title: How Can I Hedge Against Inflation? (Hour 2)
description:
Dave Ramsey & George Kamel discuss:

What it means to have a hedge against inflation,

How to manage an inherited 401(k),

Moving 529s from person to person,

The best thing to do before going back to school.


Support Our Sponsor:
Zander Insurance

Want a plan for your money? Find out where to start: https://bit.ly/3nInETX
Listen to all The Ramsey Network podcasts: https://bit.ly/3GxiXm6
